channel.title: MoparScape Moderator Icon?
channel.description:
I am not completely sure if this is in the correct section; or if there is any section at all.
But, I have noticed for the past 2 days since the MoparScape Moderator calentine icon was removed, the previous icon (the bulbasaur without hearts) is now just a star? Yesterday it was an unloadable image, and now it is just a *. What's going on?

item.title: MoparScape Moderator Icon?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Taharok:

Btw, the image previews in the admin panel, I’m surprised the admin who changed the awards didn’t notice that the one they supplied didnt appear?

It did appear!

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Moderator Icon?

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I have fixed it!

item.title: MoparScape Moderator Icon?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

When an admin reads this, change the extension from bulbasaur.png to bulbasaur.gif. This wouldn’t have happened if all of the awards were created in the same format. Gj Starblaster. :rolleyes:

Btw, the image previews in the admin panel, I’m surprised the admin who changed the awards didn’t notice that the one they supplied didnt appear?

Read full topic

I think it’s just forum difficulties, though I’m not positive.
